data.actual_result: The message disappears, but then an invalid empty message with the preview of the link shows up
data.expected_result: The message disappears, all is fine
data.short_description: Link preview creates an invalid message on the client side if the message with the link was deleted right before the preview shows up
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a link that has a preview - Post it - Delete it right before the preview will be shown - If you cannot keep up, you can find a website which loads not very quickly (I used <>) and append "?r=<random letters here>" to the link to stop Discord caching the response.
